_header: Jesu that is full of disport / Gave his disciples their comfort
Subjects: sermon texts, Gospel; Philip and James, saints
_description: Gospel, ‘In festo SS. Philipi et Iacobi’, in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IHesus þat is ful of disportȜaf his disciplus heore
                    cumfort…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat his so mote do in vsPrey we faste to goode
                    Ihesus
BodEngPoeta1.Attributed Title:
Missus est Angelus Gabriel / Non turbetur cor nestrum neque (f.
                        221rb)

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
IHesus þat is ful of disportȜaf his disciples here
                    confort…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
…Þat is so mote do in vsPrey we faste to goode
                    Ihesus
